name: Grow Away
description:
Feed your circle good "bits" and avoid bad ones in order to grow it!

The goal is to grow your circle to a specified target size. By moving the pong pads across 5 lanes with good timing, bounce back bad bits to their destruction and let good ones through to grow it.

Higher level bits consume smaller ones in case they crash. 

Red always wins equal-size crashes unless the other bit is powered up, which is done by clicking on a bit.

Enjoy!
